ygData.subject: Re: Cazic Thule
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I have heard from druid and mage friends is no (at least for their spells, but I don t think there would be much difference between the spell and
ygData.messageBody:
From what I have heard from druid and mage friends is "no" (at least for
their spells, but I don't think there would be much difference between the
spell and the song). Once you rae targeted by a crit, you stay targeted
until you zone or get out of it's aggro area. (Found out about the aggro
area in EK the other night when I would outrun a griffawn or an extra gnoll
reaver while trying to drag it to a druid friend of mine nwho was kiting
crags near he barb fishing village.)
If you escapeit's aggro area, it will seem to forget about you until you
get back in the area. (Or maybe they just knew I would be bacK? Damned IA
=oPP )
-=B=-
NOR Bard, Esq.
Just made 17th Wheeeeee!!! (Any ideas on best weapons to Dual? Since I had
an extra one in the bank I'm using 2 mino axes)
